Package gw.api.admin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABGroupTreeNode  
    AdminTreeNodeFactory  
    AttributeSearchCriteria
    Stores a user's search criteria when searching for attributes. Currently the only criteria the user can specify are the attribute name and type.
    BaseAdminUtil
    Utility methods for working with objects in the Admin area of Guidewire's applications. These utilities are generally useful and are not specific to any single application.
    DecentralizedAdminActivityPatternFilter  
    DecentralizedAdminFilter  
    DecentralizedAdminRoleFilter  
    DestinationMessageStatistics
    Represents statistics about messages in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging). Each DestinationMessageStatistics object represents statistics for a particular messaging destination: The destination id. The destination name. The destination status (such as "started" or "suspended"). The number of failed messages for the destination. The number of retried messages for the destination. The number of messages currently in flight for the destination. The number of pending unsent messages for the destination. DestinationMessageStatistics objects are used to display messaging status in the administration UI.
    DestinationMessageStatistics.DestinationAction  
    DestinationMessageStatisticsUtil
    Utilities for retrieving DestinationMessageStatistics objects, to display the status of messaging destinations to the user.
    EventMessage
    Information about a single message in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging). Each EventMessage object represents details of a message: The message id Whether the message can be skipped. Only active messages - messages which haven't already been processed - can be skipped. The message send time. The message name. The message destination id. The message destination name. The message order (messages are sent in the order they were added). The message sender reference (an optional field, set at send time by some messaging plugins). The message status (for example Pending Send, Acknowledged). The message response - set to an error message if the message failed, otherwise empty. EventMessage objects are used to display a snapshot of the status of individual messages in the administration UI.
    ExportDataInfo
    Maintains a data set to be exported. An export data set is a set of related data, such as the entire set of administration data or the role privileges. This class has a method for listing all the available data sets and also maintains a currently selected data set.
    GroupPickerTreeNode  
    GroupTreeNode  
    GroupUserUtil
    Utility methods for manipulating a user's groups.
    GroupUtil
    Utility method for creating groups.
    ImportDataArrayDifferences
    Represents the differences between the imported and the original values of a particular array field on an entity. Used after importing data to display differences in an array to the user.
    ImportDataConflict
    Represents the fields that have changed on an entity as the result of a data import. Given an updated entity, constructs a ImportDataFieldConflict object for each field of the entity which changed. There is also an "overwrite" flag, typically set through the UI by the user, that indicates whether the imported changes should overwrite the existing values.
    ImportDataInfo
    Information about the import of an XML data file. Allows an XML file to be imported and tracks which entities changed as a result of the import. A resolution strategy can be specified to decide whether the changes should overwrite the existing data, be discarded or decided manually case by case. Provides a commit changes method which applies the imported changes according to the selected resolution strategy.
    ImportDataInfo.ResolutionOption  
    MessagingUtil
    Provides utility functions supporting messaging admin screens.
    OrganizationTreeNode  
    PublicRoleFinder
    Finder methods for Roles.
    PublicZoneFinder  
    RegionSearchCriteria
    Stores a user's search criteria when searching for regions. Currently the only criteria the user can specify are the region name and type.
    RootTreeNode  
    SOOMessageFilters
    Helper class containing display filters for selecting messages based on status.
    SOOMessageFilters.Failed  
    SOOMessageFilters.FilerSetClass  
    SOOMessageFilters.Retry  
    SOOMessageFilters.Unfinished  
    SOOMessageStatisticsUtil
    Helper class used to retrieve messaging statistics for a message destination.
    SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics
    Data object used to encapsulate messaging statistics for messages related to a particular "ordering object" (such as a claim).
    ScriptParameterUtil
    UnassignedUsersGroup  
    UnassignedUsersGroupNode  
    UserAttributeUtil
    Utilities for the administrative UI for creating attributes.
    UserContactHandle
    A wrapper around a User which provides the ContactHandle interface, so the User can be used by any PCF file or rule that expects a ContactHandle. ContactHandle is a simple interface which provides getContact and setContact methods. We couldn't have UserBase extend ContactHandle directly, because both declare a method named "getContact()", but the return types are different. Java doesn't allow co-variant return types.
    UserRegionUtil
    Utilities for the administrative UI for creating regions.
    WorkflowUtil  
    ZoneAutocompleteHandler  
    ZoneSearchCriteria
    Search criteria for zones.
